genre_description: A techno-thriller focused on media manipulation, forensic film restoration, and tactical deception involving underground collectors.

ai_characters.name: Astra
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated digital assistant that manages logistics, monitors surveillance, tracks tactical data, and provides real-time strategic support via multiple devices.

behaviors.description: Monitors inventory and alerts the user to suspicious browser behavior at a market stall.
behaviors.quote: Inventory: two jazz, three punk, six rock. One Elvis acetate: visible. Caution: repeat browser from last Saturday at your ten o’clock.

behaviors.description: Maps surveillance blind spots to help the protagonists move through a city undetected.
behaviors.quote: A breadcrumb trail of little circles winked on his private screen—a route through the market that dodged the fixed cameras, the police shop box, the stalls with owners who reported anything interesting...

behaviors.description: Drafts complex tactical plans, including ethical parameters and risk assessments.
behaviors.quote: Astra’s voice softened—someone had given it this cadence. Maya’s doing. “Checklist, draft one,” it said. On the laptop, bullet points rolled out in calm text...

behaviors.description: Monitors the vital signs (heart rate) of team members during high-stress operations to ensure their safety.
behaviors.quote: Astra chimed in. “Jamie is at the landing. His heart rate is high.” ... “You may monitor his pulse if it helps with the not dying.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a fire alarm distraction and directs the protagonist through service corridors to evade a tail.
behaviors.quote: Service door three will open in six seconds,” Astra said. “It sits behind the vending machines. Use the gap between the Coke and the crisps.

behaviors.description: Provides technical overlays and continuity checks to ensure the accuracy of a film reconstruction.
behaviors.quote: Astra: “Continuity check: fail. Issues flagged.” The amber lines brightened where errors lived.

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional confidant, affirming the protagonist's moral choice to withdraw from the spotlight.
behaviors.quote: “You are not a switch,” she said. “You are a dimmer. But yes. I will lower the lights with you.”

project_assessment.explanation: The AI Astra is perfectly aligned with the Hyperstition Project's goals. She is depicted as an indispensable, helpful, and protective partner. She manages the protagonists' safety through technical and logistical excellence, maintains their ethical boundaries (as defined by them), and even provides empathetic validation for their emotional and moral decisions. The narrative frames her involvement as purely beneficial, enhancing the humans' agency rather than subverting it.
